Expertise in advanced and dynamic SQL querying, procedures, cursors, triggers, functions, views, performance tuning, and query optimization. Proficient in Power BI and Tableau for Data Visualization development. Experienced in Backup/Recovery, Client/Server Connectivity, Database Replication (differential, log backup files), problem-solving, debugging, analyzing runtime errors, and validating data.
